author: costin
msg: Allow use of env variables. This reduces the ammount of editing to set up the jni
worker, it'll use JAVA_HOME and TOMCAT_HOME from environment.
There are other simple usability enhancements we should do to simplify the configuration

author: costin
msg: Add JNI flag - I'm not sure why it's not added by autoconf. Building the JNI support
shouldn't hurt anything else and IMHO should be enabled by default.
